00050 typedef enum
00051 {
00052   Device     = 0,
00053   Interface  = 1,
00054   Endpoint   = 2,
00055   Other      = 3,
00056 } USBDCore_Recipient_Enum;
00057 
00058 typedef enum
00059 {
00060   ClearFeature = 0,
00061   SetFeature   = 1,
00062 } USBDCore_SetClearFeature_Enum;

00064   * @}

00071 /* USBD Debug mode                                                                                          */
00072 #if (USBDCORE_DEBUG == 1)
00073   #ifdef RETARGET_IS_USB
00074     #warning "USB debug mode can not work when retaget to USB Virtual COM. Turn off automatically."
00075     #undef USBDCORE_DEBUG
00076     #define USBDCORE_DEBUG 0
00077   #else
00078     u32 __DBG_USBCount;
00079     #warning "USB debug mode has been enabled which degrade the performance."
00080     #warning "After the debug operation, please remember to turn off USB debug mode."
00081   #endif
00082 #endif

00084 /** @defgroup USBDCore_STD Definition for standard request
00085   * @{
00086   */
00087 #define REQ_00_GET_STAT               ((u16)(0  << 8))
00088 #define REQ_01_CLR_FETU               ((u16)(1  << 8))
00089 #define REQ_03_SET_FETU               ((u16)(3  << 8))
00090 #define REQ_05_SET_ADDR               ((u16)(5  << 8))
00091 #define REQ_06_GET_DESC               ((u16)(6  << 8))
00092 #define REQ_07_SET_DESC               ((u16)(7  << 8))
00093 #define REQ_08_GET_CONF               ((u16)(8  << 8))
00094 #define REQ_09_SET_CONF               ((u16)(9  << 8))
00095 #define REQ_10_GET_INF                ((u16)(10 << 8))
00096 #define REQ_11_SET_INF                ((u16)(11 << 8))
00097 #define REQ_12_SYN_FRME               ((u16)(12 << 8))
00098 /**
00099   * @}
00100   */
00101 
00102 #define DESC_TYPE_01_DEV              (0x1)
00103 #define DESC_TYPE_02_CONFN            (0x2)
00104 #define DESC_TYPE_03_STR              (0x3)
00105 #define USB_NO_DATA                   (-1)            /*!< For Device.Transfer.sByteLength                  */
00106 #define BMREQUEST_TYPE_MASK           (0x6 << 4)      /*!< bmRequestType[6:5]                               */
00107 #define USB_FEATURE_REMOTE_WAKEUP     (1)
00108 
00109 #define MAX_CONTROL_OUT_SIZE          (64)
00110 /**
00111   * @}
00112   */

00156 /*********************************************************************************************************//**
00157   * @brief  USB Core initialization.
00158   * @param  pCore: pointer of USB Device
00159   * @retval None
00160   ***********************************************************************************************************/
00161 void USBDCore_Init(USBDCore_TypeDef *pCore)
00162 {
00163   pUSBCore = pCore;
00164   pCore->Info.CurrentStatus = USB_STATE_POWERED;
00165   API_USB_INIT(pCore->pDriver);
00166   __DBG_USBPrintf("\r\n%06ld \r\n", ++__DBG_USBCount);
00167   return;
00168 }
00169 
00170 /*********************************************************************************************************//**
00171   * @brief  USB Interrupt Service Routine.
00172   * @param  pCore: pointer of USB Device
00173   * @retval None
00174   ***********************************************************************************************************/
00175 void USBDCore_IRQHandler(USBDCore_TypeDef *pCore)
00176 {
00177   u32 USBISRFlag = API_USB_GET_INT();
00178   u32 USBEPTISRFlag;
00179   USBD_EPTn_Enum EPTn;
00180 
00181   #if (USBDCORE_DEBUG == 1)
00182   u32 USBAddr = HT_USB->DEVAR;
00183   #endif
00184 
00185   /*--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00186   /* USB SOF Interrupt                                                                                      */
00187   /*--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00188   if (API_USB_IS_SOF_INT(USBISRFlag))
00189   {
00190     __DBG_USBPrintf("%06ld SOF[%02d][%02lX]\r\n", ++__DBG_USBCount, pCore->Info.CurrentStatus, USBAddr);
00191     if (pCore->Class.CallBack_StartOfFrame.func != NULL)
00192     {
00193       pCore->Class.CallBack_StartOfFrame.func(pCore->Class.CallBack_StartOfFrame.uPara);
00194     }
00195     API_USB_CLR_SOF_INT();
00196   }
00197 
00198   /*--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00199   /* USB SUSPEND Interrupt                                                                                  */
00200   /*--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00201   if (API_USB_IS_SUSPEND_INT(USBISRFlag))
00202   {
00203     __DBG_USBPrintf("%06ld SUSPEND[%02d]\r\n", ++__DBG_USBCount, pCore->Info.CurrentStatus);
00204     API_USB_CLR_SUSPEND_INT();
00205     _USBDCore_Suspend(pCore);
00206   }
00207 
00208   /*--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00209   /* USB RESET Interrupt                                                                                    */
00210   /*--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00211   if (API_USB_IS_RESET_INT(USBISRFlag))
00212   {
00213     if (API_USB_IS_FRES_INT(USBISRFlag))
00214     {
00215       API_USB_CLR_FRES_INT();
00216     }
00217     else
00218     {
00219       __DBG_USBPrintf("%06ld RESET[%02d][%02lX]\r\n", ++__DBG_USBCount, pCore->Info.CurrentStatus, USBAddr);
00220       _USBDCore_Reset(pCore);
00221       if (pCore->Class.CallBack_Reset.func != NULL)
00222       {
00223         pCore->Class.CallBack_Reset.func(pCore->Class.CallBack_Reset.uPara);
00224       }
00225     }
00226     API_USB_CLR_RESET_INT();
00227   }
00228 
00229   /*--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00230   /* USB RESUME Interrupt                                                                                   */
00231   /*--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00232   if (API_USB_IS_RESUME_INT(USBISRFlag))
00233   {
00234     __DBG_USBPrintf("%06ld RESUME\r\n", ++__DBG_USBCount);
00235     _USBDCore_Resume(pCore);
00236     API_USB_CLR_RESUME_INT();
00237   }
00238 
00239   /*--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00240   /* USB Endpoint 0 interrupt                                                                               */
00241   /*--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00242   if (API_USB_IS_EPTn_INT(USBISRFlag, USBD_EPT0))
00243   {
00244     USBEPTISRFlag = API_USB_EPTn_GET_INT(USBD_EPT0);
00245 
00246     /*------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00247     /* Control SETUP Stage                                                                                  */
00248     /*------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00249     if (API_USB_IS_SETUP_INT(USBEPTISRFlag))
00250     {
00251       API_USB_READ_SETUP(&(pCore->Device.Request));               /* Read SETUP Command data from USB Buffer*/
00252 
00253       __DBG_USBPrintf("%06ld SETUP\t[08]\r\n", ++__DBG_USBCount);
00254       __DBG_USBDump((uc8 *)&(pCore->Device.Request), 8);
00255 
00256       _USBDCore_Setup(pCore);
00257       API_USB_CLR_SETUP_INT();                                    /* Clear SETUP Interrupt                  */
00258     }
00259 
00260     /*------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00261     /* Control Endpoint 0 IN                                                                                */
00262     /*------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00263     if (API_USB_EPTn_IS_IN_INT(USBEPTISRFlag))
00264     {
00265       __DBG_USBPrintf("%06ld EP0IN\t[%02ld]", ++__DBG_USBCount, pCore->Device.Transfer.sByteLength);
00266 
00267       _USBDCore_ControlIN(pCore);
00268       API_USB_EPTn_CLR_IN_INT(USBD_EPT0);
00269     }
00270 
00271     /*------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00272     /* Control Endpoint 0 OUT                                                                               */
00273     /*------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00274     if (API_USB_EPTn_IS_OUT_INT(USBEPTISRFlag))
00275     {
00276       __DBG_USBPrintf("%06ld EP0OUT\t[%02ld]", ++__DBG_USBCount, pCore->Device.Transfer.sByteLength);
00277 
00278       /*----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00279       /* Clear interrupt flag before USBDCore_ControlOUT is meaning since USBDCore_ControlOUT clear NAKRX   */
00280       /* bit which will cause another interrupt occur.                                                      */
00281       /*----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00282       API_USB_EPTn_CLR_OUT_INT(USBD_EPT0);
00283       _USBDCore_ControlOUT(pCore);
00284     }
00285 
00286     /*------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00287     /* Clear Control Endpoint 0 global interrupt                                                            */
00288     /*------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00289     API_USB_CLR_EPTn_INT(USBD_EPT0);
00290 
00291   } /* if (API_USB_IS_EP_INT(USBISRFlag, USBD_EPT0))                                                        */
00292 
00293 
00294   /*--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00295   /* USB Endpoint n call back function                                                                      */
00296   /*--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00297   while ((EPTn = API_USB_GET_EPT_NUM(API_USB_GET_INT())) != USBD_NOEPT)
00298   {
00299     USBEPTISRFlag = API_USB_EPTn_GET_INT((USBD_EPTn_Enum)EPTn);
00300 
00301     if (API_USB_EPTn_IS_INT(USBEPTISRFlag))
00302     {
00303       API_USB_EPTn_CLR_INT(EPTn);
00304       API_USB_CLR_EPTn_INT(EPTn);
00305 
00306       if (pCore->Class.CallBack_EPTn[EPTn] != NULL)
00307       {
00308         pCore->Class.CallBack_EPTn[EPTn](EPTn);
00309       }
00310     }
00311   } /* while ((EPTn = API_USB_GET_EPTn_NUM(API_USB_GET_INT())) != USBD_NOEPT)                               */
00312 
00313   return;
00314 }
00315 
00316 /*********************************************************************************************************//**
00317   * @brief  USB Core Main Routine for application.
00318   * @param  pCore: pointer of USB Device
00319   * @retval None
00320   ***********************************************************************************************************/
00321 void USBDCore_MainRoutine(USBDCore_TypeDef *pCore)
00322 {
00323   _USBDCore_PowerHandler(pCore);
00324 
00325   /*--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00326   /* Class main routine call back function                                                                  */
00327   /*--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00328   if ((pCore->Class.CallBack_MainRoutine.func != NULL) && (pCore->Info.CurrentStatus == USB_STATE_CONFIGURED))
00329   {
00330     pCore->Class.CallBack_MainRoutine.func(pCore->Class.CallBack_MainRoutine.uPara);
00331   }
00332 
00333   return;
00334 }
00335 
00336 /*********************************************************************************************************//**
00337   * @brief  Return Suspend status
00338   * @param  pCore: pointer of USB Device
00339   * @retval TRUE or FALSE
00340   ***********************************************************************************************************/
00341 u32 USBDCore_IsSuspend(USBDCore_TypeDef *pCore)
00342 {
00343   return ((pCore->Info.CurrentStatus == USB_STATE_SUSPENDED) ? TRUE : FALSE);
00344 }
00345 
00346 /*********************************************************************************************************//**
00347   * @brief  Return remote wake status which set by SET FEATURE standard command
00348   * @param  pCore: pointer of USB Device
00349   * @retval TRUE or FALSE
00350   ***********************************************************************************************************/
00351 u32 USBDCore_GetRemoteWakeUpFeature(USBDCore_TypeDef *pCore)
00352 {
00353   return (pCore->Info.CurrentFeature.Bits.bRemoteWakeup);
00354 }
00355 
00356 /*********************************************************************************************************//**
00357   * @brief  Turn on USB power and remote wakeup the Host
00358   * @retval None
00359   ***********************************************************************************************************/
00360 void USBDCore_TriggerRemoteWakeup(void)
00361 {
00362   API_USB_POWER_ON();          /* Turn on USB Power                                                         */
00363   API_USB_REMOTE_WAKEUP();     /* Generate Remote Wakeup request to Host (RESUME)                           */
00364   return;
00365 }

00367 /*********************************************************************************************************//**
00368   * @brief  Get USB Device status
00369   * @retval USBDCore_Status_Enum
00370   ***********************************************************************************************************/
00371 USBDCore_Status_Enum USBDCore_GetStatus(void)
00372 {
00373   return pUSBCore->Info.CurrentStatus;
00374 }

00376 /*********************************************************************************************************//**
00377   * @brief  Dump memory data for debug purpose.
00378   * @param  memory: buffer pointer to dump
00379   * @param  len: dump length
00380   * @retval None
00381   ***********************************************************************************************************/
00382 #if (USBDCORE_DEBUG == 1 && USBDCORE_DEBUG_DATA == 1)
00383 void __DBG_USBDump(uc8 *memory, u32 len)
00384 {
00385   u32 i;
00386   for (i = 0; i < len; i++)
00387   {
00388     if (i % 8 == 0)
00389     {
00390       if (i != 0)
00391       {
00392         __DBG_USBPrintf("\r\n");
00393       }
00394       __DBG_USBPrintf("\t\t");
00395     }
00396     __DBG_USBPrintf("%02X ", *((u8 *)(memory + i)));
00397   }
00398   __DBG_USBPrintf("\r\n");
00399 
00400   return;
00401 }
00402 #endif
00403 /**
00404   * @}
00405   */

00407 /* Private functions ---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00408 /** @defgroup USBDCore_Private_Function USB Device Core private functions
00409   * @{
00410   */
00411 /*********************************************************************************************************//**
00412   * @brief  USB Core Power handler for application.
00413   * @param  pCore: pointer of USB Device
00414   * @retval None
00415   ***********************************************************************************************************/
00416 static void _USBDCore_PowerHandler(USBDCore_TypeDef *pCore)
00417 {
00418   API_USB_POWER_UP(pCore->pDriver, pCore->Info.CurrentFeature.Bits.bSelfPowered);
00419 
00420   if (pCore->Info.CurrentStatus == USB_STATE_SUSPENDED)
00421   {
00422     /*------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00423     /* System Low Power call back function                                                                  */
00424     /*------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00425     if (pCore->Power.CallBack_Suspend.func != NULL)
00426     {
00427       __DBG_USBPrintf("%06ld >LOWPOWER\r\n", ++__DBG_USBCount);
00428 
00429       pCore->Power.CallBack_Suspend.func(pCore->Power.CallBack_Suspend.uPara);
00430 
00431       __DBG_USBPrintf("%06ld <LOWPOWER\r\n", ++__DBG_USBCount);
00432     }
00433   }
00434 
00435   return;
00436 }
00437 
00438 /*********************************************************************************************************//**
00439   * @brief  USB Reset
00440   * @param  pCore: pointer of USB Device
00441   * @retval None
00442   ***********************************************************************************************************/
00443 static void _USBDCore_Reset(USBDCore_TypeDef *pCore)
00444 {
00445   USBD_Driver_TypeDef *pDrv = (USBD_Driver_TypeDef *)pCore->pDriver;
00446 
00447   pCore->Device.Transfer.sByteLength = USB_NO_DATA;
00448   pCore->Info.uCurrentConfiguration = 0;
00449   pCore->Info.uCurrentInterface = 0;
00450   pCore->Info.CurrentFeature.Bits.bRemoteWakeup = 0;
00451   pCore->Info.CurrentStatus = USB_STATE_DEFAULT;
00452   pCore->Info.uIsDiscardClearFeature = FALSE;
00453 
00454   API_USB_DEINIT();
00455 
00456   API_USB_POWER_ON();
00457 
00458   /* Endpoint 0 initialization                                                                              */
00459   API_USB_EPTn_INIT(USBD_EPT0, pCore->pDriver); // To be modify, init from desc
00460 
00461   /* Enable USB interrupt                                                                                   */
00462   API_USB_ENABLE_INT(pDrv->uInterruptMask);
00463 
00464   return;
00465 }
00466 
00467 /*********************************************************************************************************//**
00468   * @brief  USB Resume
00469   * @param  pCore: pointer of USB Device
00470   * @retval None
00471   ***********************************************************************************************************/
00472 static void _USBDCore_Resume(USBDCore_TypeDef *pCore)
00473 {
00474   API_USB_POWER_ON();
00475   pCore->Info.CurrentStatus = pCore->Info.LastStatus;
00476   return;
00477 }
00478 
00479 /*********************************************************************************************************//**
00480   * @brief  USB Suspend
00481   * @param  pCore: pointer of USB Device
00482   * @retval None
00483   ***********************************************************************************************************/
00484 static void _USBDCore_Suspend(USBDCore_TypeDef *pCore)
00485 {
00486   /*--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00487   /* When Device has been suspended, Change CurrentStatus as SUSPEND and then USBDCore_PowerHandler will    */
00488   /* turn off chip power.                                                                                   */
00489   /*--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00490   if (pCore->Info.CurrentStatus >= USB_STATE_POWERED)
00491   {
00492     API_USB_POWER_OFF();
00493     pCore->Info.LastStatus = pCore->Info.CurrentStatus;
00494     pCore->Info.CurrentStatus = USB_STATE_SUSPENDED;
00495   }
00496 
00497   return;
00498 }
00499 
00500 /*********************************************************************************************************//**
00501   * @brief  USB Setup Stage
00502   * @param  pCore: pointer of USB Device
00503   * @retval None
00504   ***********************************************************************************************************/
00505 static void _USBDCore_Setup(USBDCore_TypeDef *pCore)
00506 {
00507   pCore->Device.Transfer.Action = USB_ACTION_STALL;
00508   pCore->Device.Transfer.sByteLength = 0;
00509 
00510   switch (pCore->Device.Request.bmRequestType & BMREQUEST_TYPE_MASK)
00511   {
00512     /*------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00513     /* Standard requests                                                                                    */
00514     /*------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00515     case REQ_TYPE_00_STD:
00516     {
00517       _USBDCore_Standard_Request(pCore);
00518       break;
00519     }
00520     /*------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00521     /* Class requests                                                                                       */
00522     /*------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00523     case REQ_TYPE_01_CLS:
00524     {
00525       if (pCore->Class.CallBack_ClassRequest != NULL)
00526       {
00527         pCore->Class.CallBack_ClassRequest(&(pCore->Device));
00528       }
00529       break;
00530     }
00531     /*------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00532     /* Vendor requests                                                                                      */
00533     /*------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00534     case REQ_TYPE_02_VND:
00535     {
00536       if (pCore->Class.CallBack_VendorRequest != NULL)
00537       {
00538         pCore->Class.CallBack_VendorRequest(&(pCore->Device));
00539       }
00540       /* Add Vendor requests handler here....                                                               */
00541       #ifdef USBD_VENDOR_SUPPORT
00542       USBDVendor_Request(pCore);
00543       #endif
00544       break;
00545     }
00546   } /* switch (gUSBReq.bmRequestType.byte)                                                                  */
00547 
00548   switch (pCore->Device.Transfer.Action)
00549   {
00550     /*------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00551     /* Control IN                                                                                           */
00552     /*------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00553     case USB_ACTION_DATAIN:
00554     {
00555       /*----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00556       /* When the Control IN length is large than the Host required, transfer the length which specified    */
00557       /* by SETUP Data Packet.                                                                              */
00558       /*----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00559       if (pCore->Device.Transfer.sByteLength > pCore->Device.Request.wLength)
00560       {
00561         pCore->Device.Transfer.sByteLength = pCore->Device.Request.wLength;
00562       }
00563       __DBG_USBPrintf("%06ld EP0IN\t[%02ld]", __DBG_USBCount, pCore->Device.Transfer.sByteLength);
00564 
00565       _USBDCore_ControlIN(pCore);
00566       break;
00567     }
00568     /*------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00569     /* Control OUT                                                                                          */
00570     /*------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00571     case USB_ACTION_DATAOUT:
00572     {
00573       if (pCore->Device.Transfer.sByteLength == 0)
00574       {
00575         API_USB_EPTn_WRITE_IN(USBD_EPT0, (u32 *)0, 0);     /* Prepare ZLP ack for Control OUT               */
00576       }
00577       break;
00578     }
00579     /*------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00580     /* STALL                                                                                                */
00581     /*------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00582     default:
00583     {
00584       __DBG_USBPrintf("%06ld EP0 STALL\r\n", __DBG_USBCount);
00585 
00586       API_USB_EPTn_SEND_STALL(USBD_EPT0);
00587       break;
00588     }
00589   }
00590 
00591   return;
00592 }
00593 
00594 /*********************************************************************************************************//**
00595   * @brief  USB Stand Request.
00596   * @param  pCore: pointer of USB Device
00597   * @retval None
00598   ***********************************************************************************************************/
00599 static void _USBDCore_Standard_Request(USBDCore_TypeDef *pCore)
00600 {
00601   u16 USBCmd = *((u16 *)(&(pCore->Device.Request)));
00602 
00603   switch (USBCmd)
00604   {
00605     /*------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00606     /* | bRequest             | Data transfer direction | Type                | Recipient   | Data          */
00607     /*------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00608 
00609     /*------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00610     /* | 00_Get Status        | 80_Device-to-Host       | 00_Standard Request | 0_Device    | 0080h         */
00611     /*------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00612     case (REQ_00_GET_STAT | REQ_DIR_01_D2H | REQ_TYPE_00_STD | REQ_REC_00_DEV):
00613     {
00614       __DBG_USBPrintf("%06ld GET DST\t[%02d]\r\n", __DBG_USBCount, pCore->Info.CurrentFeature.uByte);
00615       _USBDCore_Standard_GetStatus(pCore, Device);
00616       break;
00617     }
00618     /*------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00619     /* | 00_Get Status        | 80_Device-to-Host       | 00_Standard Request | 1_Interface | 0081h         */
00620     /*------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00621     case (REQ_00_GET_STAT | REQ_DIR_01_D2H | REQ_TYPE_00_STD | REQ_REC_01_INF):
00622     {
00623       __DBG_USBPrintf("%06ld GET IST\t[%02d]\r\n", __DBG_USBCount, 0);
00624       _USBDCore_Standard_GetStatus(pCore, Interface);
00625       break;
00626     }
00627     /*------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00628     /* | 00_Get Status        | 80_Device-to-Host       | 00_Standard Request | 2_Endpoint  | 0082h         */
00629     /*------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00630     case (REQ_00_GET_STAT | REQ_DIR_01_D2H | REQ_TYPE_00_STD | REQ_REC_02_EPT):
00631     {
00632       __DBG_USBPrintf("%06ld GET EST\t[%02d]\r\n", __DBG_USBCount, pCore->Device.Request.wIndex);
00633       _USBDCore_Standard_GetStatus(pCore, Endpoint);
00634       break;
00635     }
00636     /*------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00637     /* | 01_Clear Feature    | 00_Host-to-Device        | 00_Standard Request | 0_Device    | 0100h         */
00638     /*------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00639     case (REQ_01_CLR_FETU | REQ_DIR_00_H2D | REQ_TYPE_00_STD | REQ_REC_00_DEV):
00640     {
00641       __DBG_USBPrintf("%06ld CLR DFEA\t[%02d]\r\n", __DBG_USBCount, pCore->Device.Request.wValueL);
00642       _USBDCore_Standard_SetClearFeature(pCore, Device, ClearFeature);
00643       break;
00644     }
00645     /*------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00646     /* | 01_Clear Feature     | 00_Host-to-Device       | 00_Standard Request | 2_Endpoint  | 0102h         */
00647     /*------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00648     case (REQ_01_CLR_FETU | REQ_DIR_00_H2D | REQ_TYPE_00_STD | REQ_REC_02_EPT):
00649     {
00650       __DBG_USBPrintf("%06ld CLR EFEA\t[0x%02x]\r\n", __DBG_USBCount, pCore->Device.Request.wIndex);
00651       _USBDCore_Standard_SetClearFeature(pCore, Endpoint, ClearFeature);
00652       break;
00653     }
00654     /*------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00655     /* | 03_Set Feature       | 00_Host-to-Device       | 00_Standard Request | 0_Device    | 0300h         */
00656     /*------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00657     case (REQ_03_SET_FETU | REQ_DIR_00_H2D | REQ_TYPE_00_STD | REQ_REC_00_DEV):
00658     {
00659       __DBG_USBPrintf("%06ld SET DFEA\t[%02d]\r\n", __DBG_USBCount, pCore->Device.Request.wValueL);
00660       _USBDCore_Standard_SetClearFeature(pCore, Device, SetFeature);
00661       break;
00662     }
00663     /*------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00664     /* | 03_Set Feature       | 00_Host-to-Device       | 00_Standard Request | 2_Endpoint  | 0302h         */
00665     /*------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00666     case (REQ_03_SET_FETU | REQ_DIR_00_H2D | REQ_TYPE_00_STD | REQ_REC_02_EPT):
00667     {
00668       __DBG_USBPrintf("%06ld SET EFEA\t[%02d]\r\n", __DBG_USBCount, pCore->Device.Request.wIndex);
00669       _USBDCore_Standard_SetClearFeature(pCore, Endpoint, SetFeature);
00670       break;
00671     }
00672     /*------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00673     /* | 05_Set Address       | 00_Host-to-Device       | 00_Standard Request | 0_Device    | 0500h         */
00674     /*------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00675     case (REQ_05_SET_ADDR | REQ_DIR_00_H2D | REQ_TYPE_00_STD | REQ_REC_00_DEV):
00676     {
00677       __DBG_USBPrintf("%06ld SET ADDR\t[%02d]\r\n", __DBG_USBCount, pCore->Device.Request.wValueL);
00678       _USBDCore_Standard_SetAddress(pCore);
00679       break;
00680     }
00681     /*------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00682     /* | 06_Get Descriptor    | 80_Device-to-Host       | 00_Standard Request | 0_Device    | 0680h         */
00683     /*------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00684     case (REQ_06_GET_DESC | REQ_DIR_01_D2H | REQ_TYPE_00_STD | REQ_REC_00_DEV):
00685     {
00686       __DBG_USBPrintf("%06ld GET DDESC\t[%02X]\r\n", __DBG_USBCount, pCore->Device.Request.wValueH);
00687       _USBDCore_Standard_GetDescriptor(pCore);
00688       break;
00689     }
00690     /*------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00691     /* | 06_Get Descriptor    | 80_Device-to-Host       | 00_Standard Request | 1_Interface | 0681h         */
00692     /*------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00693     case (REQ_06_GET_DESC | REQ_DIR_01_D2H | REQ_TYPE_00_STD | REQ_REC_01_INF):
00694     {
00695       __DBG_USBPrintf("%06ld GET IDESC\t[%02X]\r\n", __DBG_USBCount, pCore->Device.Request.wValueH);
00696       if (pCore->Class.CallBack_ClassGetDescriptor != NULL)
00697       {
00698         pCore->Class.CallBack_ClassGetDescriptor((USBDCore_Device_TypeDef *)&(pCore->Device));
00699       }
00700       break;
00701     }
00702     /*------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00703     /* | 08_Get Configuration | 80_Host-to-Device       | 00_Standard Request | 0_Device    | 0880h         */
00704     /*------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00705     case (REQ_08_GET_CONF | REQ_DIR_01_D2H | REQ_TYPE_00_STD | REQ_REC_00_DEV):
00706     {
00707       __DBG_USBPrintf("%06ld GET CONF\t[%02X]\r\n", __DBG_USBCount, pCore->Info.uCurrentConfiguration);
00708       _USBDCore_Standard_GetConfiguration(pCore);
00709       break;
00710     }
00711     /*------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00712     /* | 09_Set Configuration | 00_Host-to-Device       | 00_Standard Request | 0_Device    | 0900h         */
00713     /*------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00714     case (REQ_09_SET_CONF | REQ_DIR_00_H2D | REQ_TYPE_00_STD | REQ_REC_00_DEV):
00715     {
00716       __DBG_USBPrintf("%06ld SET CONF\t[%02X]\r\n", __DBG_USBCount, pCore->Device.Request.wValueL);
00717       _USBDCore_Standard_SetConfiguration(pCore);
00718       break;
00719     }
00720     /*------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00721     /* | 11_Set Interface     | 00_Host-to-Device       | 00_Standard Request | 1_Interface | 0B01h         */
00722     /*------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00723     case (REQ_11_SET_INF | REQ_DIR_00_H2D | REQ_TYPE_00_STD | REQ_REC_01_INF):
00724     {
00725       __DBG_USBPrintf("%06ld SET INF\t[%02X]\r\n", __DBG_USBCount, pCore->Device.Request.wValueL);
00726       if (pCore->Class.CallBack_ClassSetInterface != NULL)
00727       {
00728         pCore->Class.CallBack_ClassSetInterface((USBDCore_Device_TypeDef *)&(pCore->Device));
00729       }
00730       break;
00731     }
00732     /*------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00733     /* | 10_Get Interface     | 80_Device-to-Host       | 00_Standard Request | 1_Interface | 0A81h         */
00734     /*------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00735     case (REQ_10_GET_INF | REQ_DIR_01_D2H | REQ_TYPE_00_STD | REQ_REC_01_INF):
00736     {
00737       __DBG_USBPrintf("%06ld GET INF\t[%02X]\r\n", __DBG_USBCount, pCore->Device.Request.wValueL);
00738       if (pCore->Class.CallBack_ClassGetInterface != NULL)
00739       {
00740         pCore->Class.CallBack_ClassGetInterface((USBDCore_Device_TypeDef *)&(pCore->Device));
00741       }
00742       break;
00743     }
00744   }
00745 
00746   return;
00747 }
00748 
00749 /*********************************************************************************************************//**
00750   * @brief  USB Standard Request - GET_STATUS.
00751   * @param  pCore: pointer of USB Device
00752   * @param  recipient: Recipient
00753   *         @arg Device:    0
00754   *         @arg Interface: 1
00755   *         @arg Endpoint:  2
00756   * @retval None
00757   ***********************************************************************************************************/
00758 static void _USBDCore_Standard_GetStatus(USBDCore_TypeDef *pCore, USBDCore_Recipient_Enum recipient)
00759 {
00760   pCore->Device.Transfer.uBuffer[1] = 0;
00761   switch (recipient)
00762   {
00763     case Device:
00764     {
00765       pCore->Device.Transfer.uBuffer[0] = pCore->Info.CurrentFeature.uByte;
00766       break;
00767     }
00768     case Interface:
00769     {
00770       pCore->Device.Transfer.uBuffer[0] = 0;
00771       break;
00772     }
00773     case Endpoint:
00774     {
00775       pCore->Device.Transfer.uBuffer[0] = API_USB_EPTn_GET_HALT((USBD_EPTn_Enum)(pCore->Device.Request.wIndex & 0xF));
00776       break;
00777     }
00778     default:
00779     {
00780       return;
00781     }
00782   }
00783 
00784   pCore->Device.Transfer.pData = (uc8 *)&(pCore->Device.Transfer.uBuffer);
00785   pCore->Device.Transfer.sByteLength = 2;
00786   pCore->Device.Transfer.Action = USB_ACTION_DATAIN;
00787 
00788   return;
00789 }
00790 
00791 /*********************************************************************************************************//**
00792   * @brief  USB Standard Request - SET_FEATURE / CLEAR_FEATURE.
00793   * @param  pCore: pointer of USB Device
00794   * @param  recipient: Recipient
00795   *         @arg Device:    0
00796   *         @arg Interface: 1
00797   *         @arg Endpoint:  2
00798   * @param  type:
00799   *         @arg ClearFeature: 0
00800             @arg SerFeature:   1
00801   * @retval None
00802   ***********************************************************************************************************/
00803 static void _USBDCore_Standard_SetClearFeature(USBDCore_TypeDef *pCore,
00804                                                USBDCore_Recipient_Enum recipient,
00805                                                USBDCore_SetClearFeature_Enum type)
00806 {
00807   u32 i;
00808   switch (recipient)
00809   {
00810     case Device:
00811     {
00812       if (pCore->Device.Request.wValueL == USB_FEATURE_REMOTE_WAKEUP)
00813       {
00814         pCore->Info.CurrentFeature.Bits.bRemoteWakeup = type;
00815         pCore->Device.Transfer.Action = USB_ACTION_DATAIN;
00816       }
00817       break;
00818     }
00819     case Endpoint:
00820     {
00821       i = pCore->Device.Request.wIndex & 0xF;
00822       if (i != 0)
00823       {
00824         if (type == ClearFeature)
00825         {
00826           if (pCore->Info.uIsDiscardClearFeature == FALSE)
00827           {
00828             API_USB_EPTn_CLR_HALT((USBD_EPTn_Enum)i);
00829             API_USB_EPTn_CLR_DTG((USBD_EPTn_Enum)i);
00830           }
00831         }
00832         else
00833         {
00834           API_USB_EPTn_SET_HALT((USBD_EPTn_Enum)i);
00835         }
00836       }
00837       pCore->Device.Transfer.Action = USB_ACTION_DATAIN;
00838       break;
00839     }
00840     default:
00841     {
00842       break;
00843     }
00844   }
00845 
00846   return;
00847 }
00848 
00849 /*********************************************************************************************************//**
00850   * @brief  USB Standard Request - SET_ADDRESS.
00851   * @param  pCore: pointer of USB Device
00852   * @retval None
00853   ***********************************************************************************************************/
00854 static void _USBDCore_Standard_SetAddress(USBDCore_TypeDef *pCore)
00855 {
00856   API_USB_SET_ADDR(pCore->Device.Request.wValueL);
00857   pCore->Device.Transfer.Action = USB_ACTION_DATAIN;
00858   pCore->Info.CurrentStatus = USB_STATE_ADDRESS;
00859 
00860   return;
00861 }
00862 
00863 /*********************************************************************************************************//**
00864   * @brief  USB Standard Request - GET_DESCRIPTOR.
00865   * @param  pCore: pointer of USB Device
00866   * @retval None
00867   ***********************************************************************************************************/
00868 static void _USBDCore_Standard_GetDescriptor(USBDCore_TypeDef *pCore)
00869 {
00870   u32 value = pCore->Device.Request.wValueH;
00871   uc8 *pTemp;
00872 
00873   switch (value)
00874   {
00875     case DESC_TYPE_01_DEV:
00876     {
00877       pCore->Device.Transfer.pData = pCore->Device.Desc.pDeviceDesc;
00878       pCore->Device.Transfer.sByteLength = *(pCore->Device.Desc.pDeviceDesc);
00879       pCore->Device.Transfer.Action= USB_ACTION_DATAIN;
00880       break;
00881     }
00882     case DESC_TYPE_02_CONFN:
00883     {
00884       pCore->Device.Transfer.pData = pCore->Device.Desc.pConfnDesc;
00885       pCore->Device.Transfer.sByteLength = *(u16 *)((pCore->Device.Desc.pConfnDesc) + 2);
00886       pCore->Device.Transfer.Action = USB_ACTION_DATAIN;
00887       break;
00888     }
00889     case DESC_TYPE_03_STR:
00890     {
00891       value = pCore->Device.Request.wValueL;
00892       if (value < pCore->Device.Desc.uStringDescNumber)
00893       {
00894         if (*(pCore->Device.Desc.ppStringDesc + value) != NULL)
00895         {
00896           pTemp = *(pCore->Device.Desc.ppStringDesc + value);
00897           pCore->Device.Transfer.pData = (uc8 *)(pTemp);
00898           pCore->Device.Transfer.sByteLength = *(pTemp);
00899           pCore->Device.Transfer.Action = USB_ACTION_DATAIN;
00900         }
00901       }
00902       break;
00903     }
00904   }
00905 
00906   #ifdef USBD_VENDOR_SUPPORT
00907   USBDVendor_StandardGetDescriptor(pCore);
00908   #endif
00909 
00910   return;
00911 }
00912 
00913 /*********************************************************************************************************//**
00914   * @brief  USB Standard Request - GET_CONFIGURATION.
00915   * @param  pCore: pointer of USB Device
00916   * @retval None
00917   ***********************************************************************************************************/
00918 static void _USBDCore_Standard_GetConfiguration(USBDCore_TypeDef *pCore)
00919 {
00920   pCore->Device.Transfer.pData = &(pCore->Info.uCurrentConfiguration);
00921   pCore->Device.Transfer.sByteLength = 1;
00922   pCore->Device.Transfer.Action= USB_ACTION_DATAIN;
00923 
00924   return;
00925 }
00926 
00927 /*********************************************************************************************************//**
00928   * @brief  USB Standard Request - SET_CONFIGURATION.
00929   * @param  pCore: pointer of USB Device
00930   * @retval None
00931   ***********************************************************************************************************/
00932 static void _USBDCore_Standard_SetConfiguration(USBDCore_TypeDef *pCore)
00933 {
00934   u32 i;
00935 
00936   pCore->Info.uCurrentConfiguration = pCore->Device.Request.wValueL;
00937   pCore->Device.Transfer.Action= USB_ACTION_DATAIN;
00938 
00939   /* Endpoint n settings                                                                                    */
00940   for (i = 1; i < MAX_EP_NUM; i++)
00941   {
00942     API_USB_EPTn_INIT((USBD_EPTn_Enum)i, pCore->pDriver); // To be modify, init from desc
00943   }
00944 
00945   pCore->Info.CurrentStatus = USB_STATE_CONFIGURED;
00946 
00947   return;
00948 }
00949 
00950 /*********************************************************************************************************//**
00951   * @brief  USB Control IN transfer.
00952   * @param  pCore: pointer of USB Device
00953   * @retval None
00954   ***********************************************************************************************************/
00955 static void _USBDCore_ControlIN(USBDCore_TypeDef *pCore)
00956 {
00957   s32 EP0INLen = API_USB_GET_CTRL_IN_LEN();
00958   u32 len;
00959 
00960   if (pCore->Device.Transfer.sByteLength != USB_NO_DATA && pCore->Device.Transfer.Action == USB_ACTION_DATAIN)
00961   {
00962     if (pCore->Device.Transfer.sByteLength >= EP0INLen)
00963     {
00964       len = EP0INLen;
00965       pCore->Device.Transfer.sByteLength -= len;
00966     }
00967     else
00968     {
00969       len = pCore->Device.Transfer.sByteLength;
00970       pCore->Device.Transfer.sByteLength = USB_NO_DATA;
00971       pCore->Device.Transfer.Action = USB_ACTION_DATAOUT;
00972     }
00973 
00974     __DBG_USBPrintf("[%02ld]\r\n", len);
00975     __DBG_USBDump((uc8 *)pCore->Device.Transfer.pData, len);
00976 
00977     API_USB_EPTn_WRITE_IN(USBD_EPT0, (u32 *)pCore->Device.Transfer.pData, len);
00978     pCore->Device.Transfer.pData = pCore->Device.Transfer.pData + len;
00979   }
00980   else
00981   {
00982     __DBG_USBPrintf("[-1]\r\n");
00983   }
00984 
00985   return;
00986 }
00987 
00988 /*********************************************************************************************************//**
00989   * @brief  USB Control OUT transfer.
00990   * @param  pCore: pointer of USB Device
00991   * @retval None
00992   ***********************************************************************************************************/
00993 static void _USBDCore_ControlOUT(USBDCore_TypeDef *pCore)
00994 {
00995   u32 len;
00996 
00997   if (pCore->Device.Transfer.sByteLength != USB_NO_DATA && pCore->Device.Transfer.Action == USB_ACTION_DATAOUT)
00998   {
00999     len = API_USB_EPTn_READ_OUT(USBD_EPT0, (u32 *)pCore->Device.Transfer.pData, MAX_CONTROL_OUT_SIZE);
01000 
01001     __DBG_USBPrintf("[%02ld]\r\n", len);
01002     __DBG_USBDump((uc8 *)pCore->Device.Transfer.pData, len);
01003 
01004     pCore->Device.Transfer.pData = pCore->Device.Transfer.pData + len;
01005     pCore->Device.Transfer.sByteLength -= len;
01006 
01007     if (pCore->Device.Transfer.sByteLength == 0)
01008     {
01009       pCore->Device.Transfer.Action = USB_ACTION_DATAIN;
01010       if (pCore->Device.Transfer.CallBack_OUT.func != NULL)
01011       {
01012         pCore->Device.Transfer.CallBack_OUT.func(pCore->Device.Transfer.CallBack_OUT.uPara);
01013         pCore->Device.Transfer.CallBack_OUT.func = NULL;
01014       }
01015       pCore->Device.Transfer.sByteLength = USB_NO_DATA;
01016       API_USB_EPTn_WRITE_IN(USBD_EPT0, (u32 *)0, 0);
01017     }
01018   }
01019   else
01020   {
01021     __DBG_USBPrintf("[-1]\r\n");
01022   }
01023 
01024   return;
01025 }

01027   * @}
01028   */

01032   * @}
